front.title: Advanced identity workshop on Applying Measurement Science in the Identity Ecosystem

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: On January 12-13, 2016, the Applied Cybersecurity Division (ACD) in the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) Information Technology Laboratory (ITL) hosted Applying Measurement Science in the Identity Ecosystema workshop to discuss the application of measurement science to digital identity management. This document summarizes the concepts and ideas presented at the workshop and serves as a platform to receive feedback on the major themes discussed at that event.
